properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique identifier id for the region

properties.name: name
properties.description: Uppercase name of the region

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Comment/remark on the region

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique identifier id for the nation

properties.name: region_key
properties.description: Key from the region that the nation belongs to

properties.name: name
properties.description: Uppercase name of the nation

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Comment/remark on the nation

collections.name: parts

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique identifier id for the part

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the part, consisting of multiple lowercase colors

properties.name: manufacturer
properties.description: Name of the manufacturer of the part (not the same as the suppliers). The manufacturer number is the same as the first digit of the part's brand number.

properties.name: brand
properties.description: The production brand that the part belongs to. The brand contains two digits where the first digit is the same as the manufacturer number (e.g. Brand#32 is from Manufacturer #3).

properties.name: part_type
properties.description: The type of the part, consisting of three uppercase descriptors where the first is a category (e.g. 'STANDARD' or 'PROMO'), the second is a processing state (e.g. 'ANODIZED' or 'PLATED') and the third is a material (e.g. 'STEEL' or 'BRASS').

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the part

properties.name: container
properties.description: The container that the part is stored in. The container consists of two uppercase descriptors where the first is a size (e.g. 'SM' or 'JUMBO') and the second is a type of container (e.g. 'BOX' or 'JAR').

properties.name: retail_price
properties.description: The retail price of the part, which it is intended to be sold for before accounting for the price the supplier charges, in US dollars. The price is rounded to the nearest cent, and most of the values are between $900 and $2000.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Description/commentary on the part

collections.description: The various products supplied by various companies in shipments to different customers

collections.name: suppliers

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique identifier id for the supplier

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the supplier, which is always Supplier#<number> where the number is the same as the supplier's key, prepended with zeros until it is 9 digits

properties.name: address
properties.description: Address of the supplier as a cryptographically encrypted string to anonymize the data.

properties.name: nation_key
properties.description: Key from the nation that the supplier belongs to

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Phone number of the supplier in the format 'CC-XXX-XXX-XXXX' where CC is the country code (each nation has a unique country code).

properties.name: account_balance
properties.description: The account balance of the supplier in US dollars. The balance is rounded to the nearest cent and most of the values are between -$1,000 and +$10,000.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Commentary/remark on the supplier

collections.description: The various companies that supply different parts to fulfill purchase orders

collections.name: lines

properties.name: order_key
properties.description: Key from the order that the line item belongs to

properties.name: part_key
properties.description: Key from the part that the lineitem describes a purchase/shipment of

properties.name: supplier_key
properties.description: Key from the supplier that the lineitem describes a purchase/shipment from

properties.name: line_number
properties.description: The line number of the lineitem within the order. Each lineitem within an order has its own line number, and represents a purchase of a part from a supplier within the order.

properties.name: quantity
properties.description: The number of units of the part that is being purchased in the lineitem, as a number between 1 and 50

properties.name: extended_price
properties.description: The extended price of the line item, which is the retail price of the part multiplied by the quantity purchased (before any discounts/taxes are applied). The price is rounded to the nearest cent and most of the values are between $900 and $100,000.

properties.name: discount
properties.description: The discount applied to the line item, which is a ratio between 0 and 1 representing percentage of the extended price. The percentage is always between 0% (0.00) and 10% (0.10)

properties.name: tax
properties.description: The sales tax applied to the line item, which is a ratio between 0 and 1 representing percentage of the extended price. The percentage is always between 0% (0.00) and 8% (0.08)

properties.name: status
properties.description: The status of the line item, which is always 'O' (for orders that have been placed but not yet filled, e.g. pending shipment) or 'F' (for orders that have been filled, e.g. already shipped)

properties.name: ship_date
properties.description: The date that the line item was shipped from the supplier/warehouse. The date is always between 1992-01-01 and 1998-12-31

properties.name: commit_date
properties.description: The date that the line item was committed to be shipped from the supplier/warehouse. The date is always between 1992-01-01 and 1998-12-31. The ship date is ideally before or on the actual commit date, but can be after it if the shipment was delayed.

properties.name: receipt_date
properties.description: The date that the line item was received by the customer. The date is always between 1992-01-01 and 1998-12-31. The receipt date is after the ship date due to the time to ship the package.

properties.name: ship_instruct
properties.description: The shipping instructions for the line item, which is always 'DELIVER IN PERSON', 'TAKE BACK RETURN', 'COLLECT COD' or 'NONE'

properties.name: ship_mode
properties.description: The shipping mode for the line item, which is always 'AIR', 'AIR REG', 'FOB', 'MAIL' or 'SHIP'

properties.name: return_flag
properties.description: The return flag for the line item, which is always 'R' (for returned items) or 'N' (for non-returned items)

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Commentary/remark on the line item

collections.description: The line items for shipments within an order. Each line item within an order has its own line number, and represents a purchase of a part from a supplier within the order. The order can contain multiple lineitems from different suppliers for different parts, and the lineitems can each have their own shipping information.

collections.name: supply_records

properties.name: part_key
properties.description: Key from the part that the supply record belongs to

properties.name: supplier_key
properties.description: Key from the supplier that the supply record belongs to

properties.name: available_quantity
properties.description: The number of units of the part that the supplier has available to supply. The quantity is usually between 1 and 1,000

properties.name: supply_cost
properties.description: The cost that it takes for the supplier to produce a single unit of the part. The cost is rounded to the nearest cent and most of the values are between $1 and $1,000.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Commentary/remark on the supply record

collections.description: Every combination of a supplier and a part that the supplier supplies. Each record contains information about the supplier of the part, the part itself, and the availability of the part from the supplier.

collections.name: orders

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique identifier id for the order

properties.name: customer_key
properties.description: Key from the customer that placed the order

properties.name: order_status
properties.description: The status of the order, which is always 'O' for orders where all line items of the order have status 'O', 'F' for orders where all line items of the order have status 'F', and 'P' otherwise

properties.name: total_price
properties.description: The total price of the order after any discounts/taxes are applied, which is the sum of the extended price * (1 - discount) * (1 - tax) for all line items in the order. The price is rounded to the nearest cent and most of the values are between $800 and $600,000.

properties.name: order_date
properties.description: The date that the order was placed. The date is always between 1992-01-01 and 1998-12-31

properties.name: order_priority
properties.description: The priority of the order, which is always '1-URGENT', '2-HIGH', '3-MEDIUM', '4-NOT SPECIFIED' or '5-LOW'

properties.name: clerk
properties.description: The clerk that processed the order, which is always 'Clerk#<number>' where the number is prepended with zeros until it is 9 digits

properties.name: ship_priority
properties.description: The priority of the order for shipping, which is always 0

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Commentary/remark on the order

collections.description: The orders that have been placed by customers. Each order can contain multiple lineitems from different suppliers for different parts, and the lineitems can each have their own shipping information.

collections.name: customers

properties.name: key
properties.description: Unique identifier id for the customer

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the customer, which is always Customer#<number> where the number is the same as the customer's key, prepended with zeros until it is 9 digits

properties.name: address
properties.description: Address of the customer as a cryptographically encrypted string to anonymize the data.

properties.name: nation_key
properties.description: Key from the nation that the customer belongs to

properties.name: phone
properties.description: Phone number of the customer in the format 'CC-XXX-XXX-XXXX' where CC is the country code (each nation has a unique country code).

properties.name: account_balance
properties.description: The account balance of the customer in US dollars. The balance is rounded to the nearest cent and most of the values are between -$1,000 and +$10,000.

properties.name: market_segment
properties.description: The market segment that the customer belongs to, which is always 'BUILDING', 'FURNITURE', 'AUTOMOBILE', 'MACHINERY' or 'HOUSEHOLD'

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Commentary/remark on the customer

collections.description: The customers in the system within each nation. Each customer can have placed zero, one, or several orders.

relationships.name: nations
relationships.description: The nations contained within a region

relationships.name: region
relationships.description: The region that a nation is part of

relationships.name: suppliers
relationships.description: The suppliers belonging to a nation

relationships.name: nation
relationships.description: The nation that a supplier belongs to

relationships.name: customers
relationships.description: The customers belonging to a nation

relationships.name: nation
relationships.description: The nation that a customer belongs to

relationships.name: supply_records
relationships.description: The records indicating which companies supply the part

relationships.name: part
relationships.description: The part that a supply record belongs to

relationships.name: lines
relationships.description: The line items for shipments of the part

relationships.name: part
relationships.description: The part that a line item contains, e.g. what part is being shipped as part of an order

relationships.name: supply_records
relationships.description: The records indicating which parts the supplier supplies

relationships.name: supplier
relationships.description: The supplier that a supply record belongs to

relationships.name: lines
relationships.description: The line items for shipments from the supplier, e.g. all purchases made from the supplier

relationships.name: supplier
relationships.description: The supplier that a line item contains, e.g. what supplier is the part being purchased from as part of an order

relationships.name: part_and_supplier
relationships.description: The corresponding entry in the supply records detailing more information about the supplier of the purchase and the part that was purchased

relationships.name: lines
relationships.description: The line item instances of a part/supplier combination being purchased by a customer

relationships.name: order
relationships.description: The order that the line item belongs to

relationships.name: lines
relationships.description: The line items that belong to an order, each representing the purchase of a specific part from a specific supplier

relationships.name: customer
relationships.description: The customer that placed the order

relationships.name: orders
relationships.description: The orders that a customer has placed, each of which contains one or more line items
